name: restrreld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe))))

stmt.origin: syl6eq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe)), cres(c1, c2), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cres(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cres(c1, c2), cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cres(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cres(c1, c2), cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe)))

|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cres(c1, c2)))

comment: The restriction of a transitive relation is a transitive relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)
